articles.title: Zomato, Swiggy see record food orders on New Year's eve - Times Now
articles.description: While Swiggy declined to comment on specific numbers, sources ET NOW spoke to said the orders on Swiggy saw a huge spike after 4:30 pm on New Year's eve and continued to surge, crossing 4,000 orders per minute

articles.title: Why Indian economy seems set for revival in the new year after a tough 2020 - ThePrint

articles.title: Core sector shrinks 2.6% in Nov, 9th month in a row - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: The eight key core sectors contracted for the ninth consecutive month in November, posing some concerns for policy makers in the new year.
